title: The International Relations of Sub-Saharan Africa
description:
The module examines the insertion of Sub-Saharan Africa into the world, and looks at both intra-African international relations, as well as how African states
have interacted with various external actors. Students will examine the implications of issues such as governance, security, and development aid for Africa’s international relations. They will also learn about the international relations of key African states with countries outside Africa.
